testcase.name: testReverseToDirectionChange

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: After reversing to a GameState where the snake changed direction, the snake should keep going in the direction it is pointing to (if user does not input anything), and not perform automatically the same turn it performed the previous time -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=2, actions=<> Want | Got ✓ ------------- OO>.. | OO>.. A.... | A.... ..... | .....
step=1, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- .OO>. | .OO>. A.... | A.... ..... | .....
step=2, rand=2, actions=<ChangeDir(South()), Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ..OO. | ..OO. A..v. | A..v. ..... | .....
step=3, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ...O. | ...O. A..O. | A..O. ...v. | ...v.
step=4, rand=2, actions=<ChangeDir(East()), ChangeDir(West()), Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------- ..... | ..... A..O. | A..O. ..<O. | ...O>
step=5, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------- ..... | ..... A.... | A.... .<OO. | >..OO
step=6, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------- ..... | ..... A.... | A.... <OO.. | O>..O
step=7, rand=2, actions=<ReverseGame(true), Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------- ..... | ..... A.... | A.... .<OO. | >..OO
step=8, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------- ..... | ..... A..O. | A..O. ..<O. | ...O>
step=9, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ...O. | ...O. A..O. | A..O. ...v. | ...v.
step=10, rand=2, actions=<ReverseGame(false), Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ...v. | ...v. A..O. | A..O. ...O. | ...O.
step=11, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ...O. | ...O. A..v. | A..v. ...O. | ...O.
step=12, rand=2, actions=<ReverseGame(true), Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ...v. | ...v. A..O. | A..O. ...O. | ...O.
step=13, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ...O. | ...O. A..O. | A..O. ...v. | ...v.
step=14, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ..OO. | ..OO. A..v. | A..v. ..... | .....
step=15, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- .OO>. | .OO>. A.... | A.... ..... | .....
step=16, rand=2, actions=<ReverseGame(false), Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- ..OO> | ..OO> A.... | A.... ..... | .....
